(numRXQEntries, power_pad).explanation: Increasing the number of receive queue entries requires additional hardware structures that need I/O connections, directly increasing pad power consumption;

(numRXQEntries, power_switching).explanation: More receive queue entries mean more transistors and logic gates that switch during operation, directly increasing dynamic switching power;

(numRXQEntries, time).explanation: Larger receive queues can improve memory parallelism and reduce stalls, potentially decreasing execution time;
